verbose_text: Stimulation of TRIF dependent signaling pathway resulted in the revitalization of the the transcriptional regulator IRF3, the late-phase activation of NF-kappaB, and the activation of mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK).
evidence: transcriptional regulator IRF3, the late-phase activation of NF-kappaB, and the activation of mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK
